answer.content:
### Extract, Transform, Load:

| Phase | Action |
|-------|--------|
| **Extract** | Get data from sources |
| **Transform** | Clean, enrich, combine |
| **Load** | Store in target system |

### Extraction Types:

| Method | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| **Full** | All data each time |
| **Incremental** | Only new/changed |
| **CDC** | Change Data Capture |

### Common Transformations:

| Type | Example |
|------|--------|
| Cleaning | Remove nulls |
| Mapping | Code to description |
| Aggregation | Sum, average |
| Joins | Combine tables |

### Load Strategies:

| Strategy | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| **Full refresh** | Replace all data |
| **Append** | Add new rows |
| **Upsert** | Update or insert |

### Validation Points:

| Check | Purpose |
|-------|--------|
| Row counts | Data completeness |
| Data types | Format correctness |
| Business rules | Logical validity |
| Referential | Relationship integrity |

answer.content:
### Comparison:

| Aspect | ETL | ELT |
|--------|-----|-----|
| Transform where | Before load | After load |
| Best for | On-premise | Cloud DW |
| Flexibility | Less | More |
